title: Add Phonetic Search with Cologne Phonetic to documentation
description: The results of https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/SOLR-2276 (addition of ColognePhonetic as a phonetic search filter) should be documented in the javadocs of solr.PhoneticFilterFactory and in the Wiki http://wiki.apache.org/solr/AnalyzersTokenizersTokenFilters.

comments.author: Alexandre Rafalovitch
comments.content: This has been done at some point in the past, both for Javadoc and for Reference Guide
